foreignData.name: Utensil der Besserung
foreignData.text:
{W}, opfere das Utensil der Besserung: Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
Wenn das Utensil der Besserung aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Ingenio de mejora
foreignData.text:
{W}, sacrificar el Ingenio de mejora: Ganas 2 vidas.
Cuando el Ingenio de mejora vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Outil d'amélioration
foreignData.text:
{W}, sacrifiez l'Outil d'amélioration : Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
Quand l'Outil d'amélioration est mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Strumento di Ripresa
foreignData.text:
{W}, Sacrifica lo Strumento di Ripresa: Guadagni 2 punti vita.
Quando lo Strumento di Ripresa viene messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 改良器具
foreignData.text:
{W}, 改良器具を生け贄に捧げる：あなたは２点のライフを得る。
改良器具が戦場から墓地に置かれたとき、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.name: 향상 장치
foreignData.text:
{W}, 향상 장치를 희생한다: 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
향상 장치가 전장에서 무덤에 놓일 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Implemento de Aprimoramento
foreignData.text:
{W}, Sacrifique Implemento de Aprimoramento: Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
Quando Implemento de Aprimoramento for colocado em um cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, compre um card.

foreignData.name: Орудие Улучшения
foreignData.text:
{W}, пожертвуйте Орудие Улучшения: вы получаете 2 жизни.
Когда Орудие Улучшения попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 改进擎具
foreignData.text:
{W}，牺牲改进擎具：你获得2点生命。
当改进擎具从战场进入坟墓场时，抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 改進擎具
foreignData.text:
{W}，犧牲改進擎具：你獲得2點生命。
當改進擎具從戰場進入墳墓場時，抽一張牌。

name: Implement of Improvement
originalText:
{W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life.
When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

rulings.text: An Implement’s last ability triggers no matter why it’s put into a graveyard from the battlefield. You don’t have to activate its first ability.

If you activate an Implement’s first ability, you’ll draw a card from its second ability before the first ability resolves. If the first ability has a target, you need a legal target to activate that ability, and you choose that target before seeing what card you’ll draw.

text:
{W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life.
When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
